about_the_game:
About This Content:

This free DLC adds 9 new levels to the game, featuring the same backgrounds with slight object changes. The main difference is that all characters in these levels appear without clothing. To access this content, you must own the base game.

🎮 This content may include explicit scenes that:❌ Are not suitable for watching at work❌ Are not suitable for all ages✔️ All characters in the game are 18 years old or older

🧡 There’s nothing wrong with love and art when it’s between consenting adults. However, it’s important to remember:👶 Children and teens should avoid this content to ensure they grow up in a safe and appropriate environment.

💡 Please act responsibly and make sure you’re of the required age before enjoying this content.

😊 Thank you for understanding, and stay mindful! ❤️

content_descriptors.notes:
Description of DLC with adult content.
This free DLC adds 9 new levels, each featuring a unique nude character. To access this content, you must own the base game.
This DLC for the anime item quest game contains content for adult players only (18+). This add-on features scenes with explicit content, including romance and BDSM-themed elements.

It is important for players to be aware that some story scenes contain moments with mild elements of dominance and submission that may not be appropriate for certain audiences. All interactions in the game are consensual, however, if such topics are not to your liking, it is recommended to refrain from installing this add-on.

Main features of the DLC:

Exclusive scenes with anime-style characters
Romantic and spicy moments, including BDSM elements
Additional quests and new items to find
Important: This content is intended exclusively for persons over 18 years of age. It is recommended to read the description and consider the presence of explicit scenes before installing.
